Crimes.Crime_Name: Acts contrary to the purposes and principles of the United Nations
Crimes.Threat_Assessment: Salgado’s continued support of the Salvadoran Air Force involved in bombing civilians posed a threat aligned with acts contrary to UN principles.
Crimes.Risk_Factor: Association with military operations targeting civilians.
Crimes.Nature_of_Acts: Supplying aircraft parts used in bombings of civilian populations.
Crimes.Admission_or_Involvement: Salgado admitted working for the Air Force and supplying critical parts.
Crimes.Individual_Behavior: Continued employment despite knowledge of human rights abuses.
Crimes.Nature_of_Membership: Employment as a technician supplying military equipment.
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Issue: Credibility of Salgado's claim that he remained solely for economic reasons.
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Partially credible, but insufficient to overcome complicity findings.
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Found not credible enough to negate exclusion under Article 1(F)
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Article 1(F)(c) of the UN Refugee Convention
Crimes.Governing_Provision: UN Convention Relating to the Status of Refugees
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Exclusion for acts contrary to purposes and principles of the United Nations
Crimes.Decision_Level: First-level decision by RPD, upheld on judicial review
Crimes.Authority_Decision: Dismissal of refugee claim based on exclusion grounds
Crimes.Process: Refugee determination followed by judicial review
